prompt: <description>Part 1: Three-dimensional rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: -90.0, 0.0, -90.0 - Translation Vector: 0.2344, 0.0, 0.0 Now create a 2D sketch on the XY plane of the coordinate system. 1. Sketch a rectangle with the following dimensions: - Face 1, Loop 1: - Line 1: 0.0, 0.0 to 0.75, 0.0 - Line 2: 0.75, 0.0 to 0.75, 0.4688 - Line 3: 0.75, 0.4688 to 0.3248, 0.4688 - Line 4: 0.3248, 0.4688 to 0.0, 0.2812 - Line 5: 0.0, 0.2812 to 0.0, 0.0 2. Sketch a circle at the center of face 1 with a radius of 0.0656 units. The circle should be concentric with line 4. Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75. Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector of the coordinate system. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model with the following properties: - Extrude depth towards normal: 0.1172 units - Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.1172 units - Sketch scale: 0.75 The resulting shape is a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center. The dimensions of the prism are 0.2344 by 0.75 by 0.75 units. The hole has a diameter of 0.1312 units (2 x 0.0656) and a height of 0.3472 units (2 x 0.1172 + 0.0656). The prism is centered on the x-axis and the hole is centered on the y-axis. Now that Part 1 is complete, move on to Part 2 (if applicable).</description>

{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[-90.0,0.0,-90.0],"Translation Vector":[0.2344,0.0,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.4688]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.4688],"End Point":[0.3248,0.4688]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.3248,0.4688],"End Point":[0.0,0.2812]},"line_5":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.2812],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}},"loop_2":{"circle_1":{"Center":[0.4688,0.2812],"Radius":0.0656}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.1172,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.1172,"sketch_scale":0.75,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}}}}
